ce.cantReachBackend: Can't reach backend — make sure BASE_URL is set to your Swetrix CE instance URL

common.bookACall: Book a call with the founder
common.name: Name

performance.slogan: End user performance monitoring to deliver fast websites.
performance.description: Deliver a flawless experience to your users, and we will let you know if your site is fast enough.

fast.title: Everyone loves a fast website
fast.desc:
People love fast websites, so in addition to <indexUrl>traffic analytics</indexUrl>, Swetrix allows you to analyse your website speed and monitor other performance metrics based on real traffic from your users.
Users are more likely to <wpostatsUrl>abandon your website</wpostatsUrl> if it takes too long to load, stay ahead of these problems and measure insights from real interactions.
list: Measure which pages are taking too long to load
Aggregate performance data by geolocation, browser, device type, page and other metrics
Compare site speed to previous periods to analyse potential problems or improvements

metrics.title: Analyse all key metrics in one tool
metrics.desc: With Swetrix you can measure key metrics such as overall page load time, detailed breakdowns by TTFB, DNS, TLS resolution time and other metrics. Split the data into different percentiles to see how well your site performs for people with fast and slow internet connections.

privacy.title: Privacy-first, easy to use
privacy.desc:
Swetrix is built with a privacy-first and transparent approach. We do not use cookies or collect personal information from our users. There's no cross-site or cross-device tracking. No data is ever sold to advertisers or anyone else.
The Swetrix dashboard is very intuitive to use, giving you real-time data and a clear view of your website. There are no layers of menus, no need to export your data into custom reports to understand it properly.

errors.slogan: End user error tracking tool to deliver bug-free experiences.
errors.description: Focus on making beautiful apps, and we will let you know if something goes wrong.

fast.title: Deliver bug-free experiences
fast.desc: Everyone hates bugs, so in addition to <indexUrl>traffic</indexUrl> and <perfUrl>performance</perfUrl> analytics, Swetrix allows you to monitor your website errors to quickly resolve them. Easily set up error monitoring with a <oneLC>one line of code</oneLC>, so you can focus on building your applications, not hunting for bugs.
list: Get a bird's eye insights on what kind of errors are present on your website
View specific error details and aggregated data by geolocation, browser, device type, page and other metrics
Understand if the bug is new or regressed, making it easier to fix

track.title: Track all errors with one tool
track.desc: With Swetrix, you can track exactly what kind of errors your users are experiencing and when. We also give you insight into which browsers, operating systems, devices and more, making it even easier to resolve issues.

captchaPage.slogan: Protect your website from bots with privacy-focused CAPTCHA
captchaPage.description: Swetrix CAPTCHA is an open source and easy to use captcha solution. It's simple to integrate and provides exceptional bot protection while respecting user privacy.
captchaPage.whySwetrixDesc: Unlike other CAPTCHA providers, we put privacy first. No tracking, no cookies, just effective bot protection.

privacy.title: Privacy-focused
privacy.desc: Swetrix CAPTCHA stays feature-rich and easy to use while remaining privacy-focused. The captcha challenges are carried out absolutely anonymously and the analytics data cannot be pinpointed to a specific user.

opensource.title: Open-source
opensource.desc: Our source code is available to anyone on GitHub so anyone can analyse and review it at any time. If you'd like to run CAPTCHA on your own server, you're welcome to do so.

customisable.title: Customisable
customisable.desc: You can customise the CAPTCHA to your liking - you can change the theming colours and adjust settings to match your website's design.

easy.title: Easy to use
easy.desc: Integrate the CAPTCHA into your website in just a few minutes. You can use our pre-built code snippets, it's already included in Swetrix Analytics plans.

howItWorks.title: Simple integration, powerful protection
howItWorks.desc: Get started with Swetrix CAPTCHA in three easy steps

step1.title: Create a project
step1.desc: Sign up for Swetrix and create a new CAPTCHA project from your dashboard

step2.title: Add the widget
step2.desc: Copy the code snippet and add it to your forms - it takes just a few lines of code

step3.title: Verify on server
step3.desc: Use our API to verify the CAPTCHA response on your server and filter out bots

demo.title: Experience Swetrix CAPTCHA
demo.description: Swetrix CAPTCHA uses an invisible proof-of-work challenge. Instead of annoying puzzles, it checks the user's device in the background.
demo.description2: Users complete a quick verification to prove they are human. This simple step secures your forms against spam and automated attacks.
demo.formSubtitle: Use the sample form to experience Swetrix CAPTCHA in action.
demo.success: Form submitted successfully! The CAPTCHA verification passed.

errors.notCompleted: Please complete the CAPTCHA verification first.

demoPage.title: Swetrix CAPTCHA Developer Demo
demoPage.subtitle: Test and configure the CAPTCHA widget
demoPage.learnMore: Learn more about integrating CAPTCHA in our documentation.

marketers.slogan: Discover the ultimate open-source web analytics tailored for marketers
marketers.description: Swetrix is a comprehensive tool to drive your campaigns, optimise your strategies, and achieve unparalleled success - all in one service.

whyUs.name: Easy integration and configuration
desc: Quick Start: Swetrix provides easy integration with your existing systems and quick setup, enabling marketers to start analysing traffic quickly.
Simple interface: An intuitive interface that does not require deep technical knowledge allows marketers to easily navigate and use the service.

whyUs.name: Advanced analytics features
desc: Detailed traffic analysis: Swetrix offers a wide range of metrics to analyse user behaviour, helping marketers make informed decisions.
Flexible reports: Swetrix provides an ability to customise reports to meet the specific needs of marketers, allowing them to focus on the most important metrics.

whyUs.name: Privacy and regulatory compliance
desc: GDPR compliance: Swetrix is GDPR compliant, which ensures safe and legal use of the service.
Data security: High level of data protection, which is important for marketers who work with sensitive information.

whyUs.name: Customer support
desc: High-quality support: Swetrix provides fast and efficient support to help marketers resolve any questions or issues.
Educational materials: Access to learning resources and tips to help you make the most of the service.

whyUs.name: Flexibility and scalability
desc: Different pricing plans: Swetrix offers different pricing plans to suit all budgets and needs, allowing marketers to choose the best option.
Scalability: The ability to expand the functionality of the service in line with business growth and needs.

whyUs.name: Comparison with the competition
desc: Transparency and trust: Swetrix is open and transparent, which creates trust among users.
Unique features: Swetrix offers dozens of unique and useful features, and here are some of them..

startups.description: Swetrix is a comprehensive tool for managing your campaigns, optimising your strategies and analysing your traffic - all in one service, without compromising user privacy.

whyUs.name: Privacy and regulatory compliance
desc: Data security: Swetrix focuses on protecting user data by not using cookies, which ensures a high degree of privacy.
GDPR compliance: Unlike Google Analytics, Swetrix is GDPR compliant, making it a safe choice for startups that care about legal compliance.

whyUs.name: Simplicity and ease of use
desc: Intuitive interface: Swetrix offers a simple and straightforward interface, making it easy to use even for those without technical experience.
Easy integration: Integration with Swetrix takes a minimum of time and effort, which allows startups to quickly start using the service.

whyUs.name: Focus on customer needs
desc: Personalised solutions: Swetrix offers flexible settings and the ability to adapt to the individual needs of each startup.
Customer support: High-quality customer support that helps to quickly resolve any issues and adjustments.

whyUs.name: Accessibility and cost-effectiveness
desc: Competitive prices: Swetrix offers competitive pricing, which is especially important for startups on a tight budget.
Free trial period: The possibility of free testing of the service allows startups to evaluate its benefits without financial risks.

whyUs.name: Functional capabilities
desc: Advanced traffic analysis: Swetrix provides detailed traffic analysis with a variety of metrics to help startups better understand their users.
Reports and analytics: Flexible reports and analytics that help you make informed decisions based on data.

whyUs.name: Advantages compared to the competition
desc: Transparency: Unlike some competitors, Swetrix is transparent in its operations, which creates trust among users.
Focus on privacy: Swetrix focuses on privacy protection, which sets us apart from other solutions on the market.

smbs.slogan: Privacy-focused and easy to use web analytics tailored for small businesses
smbs.description: Swetrix is an all-in-one web analytics service that will help you as an entrepreneur or small business to track your campaigns, analyse traffic and website performance without compromising user privacy.

whyUs.name: Simplicity and efficiency
desc: Easy integration and configuration: Swetrix integrates seamlessly with your existing systems, allowing you to quickly start using the service without the need for complex technical setup.
Intuitive interface: A clear and easy-to-use interface that allows managers to quickly get the information they need without any extra effort.

whyUs.name: Information availability
desc: Real-time: Swetrix provides real-time data (within seconds), which allows managers to respond quickly to changes in customer behaviour and traffic.
Flexible reports: The ability to customise reports to meet specific business needs to help you make informed decisions.

whyUs.name: Privacy and security
desc: Data protection: Swetrix provides a high degree of confidentiality and data protection, which is critical for executives who want to protect their customers' information.
Regulatory compliance: Compliance with the GDPR and other regulatory requirements, which guarantees legal security of the service.

whyUs.name: Support and assistance
desc: High-quality customer support: Swetrix provides fast and efficient support, helping to resolve any issues and problems that managers may face.
Educational resources: we have a well-developed community on Discord and on Twitter, where we are always happy to help.

whyUs.name: Cost-effective and flexible
desc: Affordable prices: Competitive prices that allow managers of small companies to get all the tools they need without significant financial outlays.
Flexible plans: The ability to choose different tariff plans to suit the size and needs of the company.

whyUs.name: Analytics and optimisation
desc: Detailed analytics: Swetrix provides advanced traffic analysis to help managers better understand customer behaviour and optimise business processes.
Marketing optimisation: The ability to analyse the effectiveness of marketing campaigns and adjust strategies to achieve better results.

hero.title: The cookieless Google Analytics alternative
hero.subtitle: Get the insights you need - real-time, accurate, and easy to understand, without cookies, invading privacy, or bloated dashboards.

comparison.title: Swetrix vs Google Analytics (GA4)
comparison.subtitle: Google Analytics is powerful, but it's built for Google. Swetrix is built for you - clean, fast, and privacy-first.
comparison.footer: Looking for a direct GA4 replacement without the privacy trade-offs? Swetrix covers the essentials (and then some) while keeping tracking lightweight and ethical.

whySwitch.label: Why teams switch
whySwitch.title:
GA4 was built for Google.
Swetrix was built for <1>you.
whySwitch.subtitle: Stop fighting consent banners and dashboards that require a PhD. Get the insights you actually need, fast.

privacy.title: Privacy without the cookie mess
privacy.description: Cookieless by default. No cross-site tracking. For many sites, that means you can skip the cookie banner entirely, and still get accurate data.

understandable.title: Instantly understandable analytics
understandable.description: GA4 can feel like a product for analysts. Swetrix is built for humans: pageviews, visitors, referrers, UTM campaigns, and custom events - exactly where you expect them.

actionable.title: Actionable insights for marketing + engineering
actionable.description: Traffic is only half the story. Swetrix adds performance monitoring and error tracking, so you can spot slow pages and broken UX before it hurts revenue.

migration.label: Quick migration
migration.title: Switch in under 5 minutes
migration.subtitle: No complex setup, no tag manager required. Just one script tag and you're done.

1.title: Add a single script tag
1.description: No cookies, no configuration, no tag-manager gymnastics.

2.title: Set up your events
2.description: Track conversions with simple API calls. UTM parameters work automatically.

3.title: You're live
3.description: Real-time data starts flowing immediately. No delays, no sampling.

items.a:
You can start with the {{lowestPlanEventsAmount}} events per month plan. If you already have some traffic, you can start with the {{moderatePlanEventsAmount}} events per month plan.

 In any case, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan anytime, and we will pro-rate your subscription if you change your plan so it would be fair for you.

items.q: What happens if I exceed my plan's limit?
items.a:
We won't stop counting your data if you exceed your plan's limit. However, you will need to upgrade to a higher plan to keep access to your stats.

We will send you an email notification if you exceed or come close to your plan's limit. We also won't restrict your dashboard if you get an occasional traffic spike or go over your limit slightly.

items.q: Does Swetrix offer a free plan?
items.a:
For our cloud version, we don't offer a free plan at this moment. We're an independent startup funded solely by our subscribers. We don't monetise or sell your data, so subscription fee is needed to cover our costs and keep the service running.

At the same time, Swetrix is open-source and we provide a Community Edition that you can self-host on your own infrastructure for free.
Yep, you can try Swetrix for free for {{freeTrialDays}} days, no credit card required!

An event is a pageview, a custom event or an error event that the tracking script sends to Swetrix. Pageviews and error events are tracked automatically based on your tracking script set up, and custom events are sent manually based on the user actions and your configuration.

Swetrix is a privacy-focused web analytics tool. We do not use cookies for tracking, and all the data is collected anonymously. We don't use persistent, cross-device tracking, and don't use your data for any other purposes. You can read more about it in our <dataPolicyUrl>data policy</dataPolicyUrl>.

Yes, you can access access your statistics or website data using our API. And you can also send pageviews or events for your websites using our API. Learn more about it in our <apiDocumentationUrl>API documentation</apiDocumentationUrl>.

items.q: Can I invite my team members to Swetrix?
items.a:
Yes! You can create an organisation and invite your team members to it, assign them roles and easily manage their access to the organisation and its projects.

You can invite people directly to your projects, create password-protected access links or make your projects public and accessible to everyone.
We provide email support and you can <contactUsUrl>contact us</contactUsUrl> at any time. We also offer a community support on our <discordUrl>Discord server</discordUrl>.

items.q: I want to ask something else...
items.a: Sure, feel free to <contactUsUrl>contact us</contactUsUrl> at any time.

gaItems.q: Is Swetrix a Google Analytics (GA4) replacement?
gaItems.a: Swetrix covers the core web analytics most teams need, plus extras like performance monitoring and error tracking - without turning your users into ad profiles.

gaItems.q: Will my site run faster than with GA?
gaItems.a: Swetrix is designed to be lightweight. Less script weight and fewer third-party calls can mean a faster site, especially on slow connections.

main.description: Get all the insights you need about your users and website visitors without the hassle of showing cookie banners. Experience intuitive, easy-to-use and GDPR-compliant web analytics without invading the privacy of your visitors.

web.title: Web analytics
web.description: Get all the insights you need about your users with a privacy-friendly and easy-to-use web analytics tool.

performance.title: Website speed and performance
performance.description: Monitor your website speed and performance metrics from real user interactions.

errors.title: Error tracking
errors.description: Get detailed insights into what kind of errors are happening on your website. View error details and aggregated data by geolocation, browser, device type, page and other metrics.

sessions.title: User sessions
sessions.description: Get detailed insights about your users' journey through your website and see how they interact with it. Track how long they stayed on your website, what actions they took and what pages visited.

cookies.title: Forget about annoying cookie banners
cookies.description: Swetrix does not use cookies for tracking, so you can forget about all those annoying cookie banners. We collect analytical data anonymously to respect the privacy of your users. We do not collect personal identifiers and do not perform cross-device tracking.

funnels.title: Funnels and user flows
funnels.description: Track how users get to your site and where they go. Study behaviour, visualise and understand your user journey.

alerts.title: Customisable alerts
alerts.description: Be the first to know when something happens on your website. Get notified via Telegram, Slack or Discord when specific events occur.

events.title: Custom events & goals
events.description: Track user interactions like sales, signups or clicks in real time. Set conversion goals to measure success and get detailed insights into how users engage with your website.

revenue.title: Revenue analytics
revenue.description: Connect your payment provider (Stripe, Paddle) and discover which marketing channels drive paying customers. Identify customer segments with highest LTV and understand patterns that influence purchase decisions.

featureFlags.title: Feature flags
featureFlags.description: Ship features safely with instant rollouts and rollbacks. Target specific user segments with boolean or percentage-based flags and track how each flag performs.

experiments.title: A/B testing & experiments
experiments.description: Run data-driven experiments to optimise conversions. Compare variants with statistical confidence, track exposures and measure the real impact of your changes.

integrations.title: Works with the tools you already use
integrations.description: Swetrix integrates with everything. Our lightweight script is just a few kilobytes in your source code. You can add it to any CMS, framework or technology you're already using.

main.whyDitch: Tired of the frustration, complexity and privacy issues of Google Analytics? We were too. That's why we built Swetrix - the ethical, open source and fully cookieless alternative.

featuresAlt.heading: Features you need, no training required

privacy.title: Privacy-first analytics
privacy.desc: Track visitors without cookies or personal data. Stay GDPR-compliant out of the box.

events.title: Custom events & goals
events.desc: Track signups, purchases and button clicks. Set conversion goals to measure what matters.

campaigns.title: Campaigns & UTMs
campaigns.desc: See which campaigns drive traffic and revenue. Track UTM parameters and measure ROI.

perf.title: Performance monitoring
perf.desc: Monitor real page load times from actual users. Spot slowdowns before they hurt conversions.

errors.title: Error tracking
errors.desc: Catch JavaScript errors automatically. See which pages, browsers and devices are affected.

sessions.title: Session analysis
sessions.desc: Follow individual user journeys across pages. Understand how visitors navigate your site.

opensource.title: Open source
opensource.desc: Fully open-source and auditable. Self-host on your own infrastructure or use our cloud.

devs.title: Built for developers
devs.desc: Lightweight script, simple API and quick setup. Get running in under 5 minutes.

unsubscribe.success: You've unsubscribed from analytics email reports

gsc.failedDesc: An error has occurred while connecting to your Google Search Console, please try again or contact support.

forgot.sent: A password reset e-mail has been sent to the specified address

signin.title: Sign in to your account
signin.2faDesc:
Open the two-factor authentication app on your device to view your authentication code and verify your identity.
You can also use your backup code.
signin.notAMember: Not a member? <url>Start a {{amount}} day free trial</url>
signin.welcomeBack: Welcome back! Please enter your details.
signin.trustedByThousands: Privacy-focused analytics trusted by thousands of developers and businesses worldwide.
signin.secureAuthDesc: Two-factor authentication adds an extra layer of security to your account
signin.testimonial: "Swetrix has been a game changer for our analytics. They've always been on top of feature requests and have been friendly every step of the way."

signup.tos: I do accept <tos>Terms and Conditions</tos> and the <pp>Privacy Policy</pp>.
signup.insightsInMinutes: Get better website insights in minutes
signup.testimonial: "Swetrix changed everything — clean dashboard, instant understanding of user behavior, and features that actually matter."

features.realTimeAnalyticsDesc: See your visitors as they happen.
features.privacyFirstDesc: No cookies used, fully open source.
features.intuitiveDesc: Easy to use, no need to be a data scientist.

verification.success: Your email has been successfully verified!

socialisation.failedDesc: An error has occurred while authenticating through a third party service, please try again or contact support.
socialisation.successDesc: You are now authenticated through a 3rd party service and can safely close this page if it didn't close automatically.

linkAccount.title: Link your account
linkAccount.description: {{email}} is already registered with Swetrix. Would you like to link your {{provider}} account for easier sign-in?
linkAccount.unlinkHint: If you want to use this email with a different account, sign into your existing account to remove it or use the email unlink feature if you don't have access.
linkAccount.2FARequired: Your account has two-factor authentication enabled. Please enter your code to continue.
linkAccount.linkSuccess: Account linked successfully! You can now sign in with {{provider}}.

common.noRememberHint: Check this box to be logged out when you close your browser. Your session will be stored temporarily instead of permanently.
common.xCharsError: The password has to consist of at least {{amount}} characters.
common.passwordTooLong: The provided password is too long, maximum length is {{amount}} characters
common.tosError: You have to accept our TOS and privacy policy in order to use our services.
common.checkLeakedPasswordDesc: When enabled we check your password with the <db>{{database}}</db> database. We don't send your password to the service. First we hash your password (using SHA1) and send only the first 5 characters of that hash to the service. The service returns all leaked passwords that start with those 5 characters. At our end we check if one of these matches with your password. We show you a warning if it has been leaked before. We never store your password in plain text.

passwordStrength.hint: Use 12+ characters with uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols for a strong password.

profileSettings.emailChanged: To confirm the change of your email address, please click the link in the email we sent you to your new email address.
profileSettings.accountDesc: Manage your profile and general settings.
profileSettings.logoutAllDesc: This will log you out from all devices and sessions, including the current one.
profileSettings.logoutAllWarning: This action will terminate all your active sessions across all devices. You will need to log in again on each device.
profileSettings.frequency: How often should we send you an email summary about your websites?
profileSettings.noLink: Didn't receive a link to confirm the email address? Request a new one!
profileSettings.languageDesc: You can change the language of the application interface.
profileSettings.interfaceDesc: Customize how Swetrix displays information to you.
profileSettings.communicationsDesc: Configure how you receive updates and notifications.
profileSettings.billingTabDesc: Manage your subscription plan and view usage details.
profileSettings.changeEmailDesc: Change your account email address. You need this email to sign in and verify your identity.
profileSettings.changePasswordDesc: Update your password to keep your account secure.
profileSettings.apiKeyDesc: Use your API key to access Swetrix programmatically.
profileSettings.sharedDesc: Projects that have been shared with you by other users.
profileSettings.organisationsDesc: Organisations you are a member of.
profileSettings.confirmEmailDesc: Your email address is not yet confirmed.
profileSettings.uiSettingsDesc: Customize the appearance and behavior of the interface.
profileSettings.notificationsDesc: Configure when and how you receive notifications.
profileSettings.deactivateConfirmation:
Are you sure you want to deactivate your account?
All of your data will be permanently removed from our servers forever.
This action cannot be undone.
profileSettings.deletionFeedback: We're sad to see you go, could you please tell us why you're leaving so we could improve our service?
profileSettings.reportSent: The GDPR data report has been sent to your email address.
profileSettings.tryAgainInXDays: Please, try again later. You can request a GDPR Export only once per {{amount}} days.
profileSettings.updated: Your account settings have been updated
profileSettings.confTimeout: An email has already been sent, check your mailbox or try again in a few minutes
profileSettings.confSent: An account confirmation link has been sent to your email
profileSettings.noConfLeft:
Unfortunately, you've ran out of your email confirmation requests.
Please make sure you are able to receive e-mails and check your SPAM folder again for messages.
You may try to use a different email address or contact our customer support service.
profileSettings.timezoneDesc:
This will be the time zone in which the data is displayed. It's only used for visualization.
No data will be modified based on this setting.
profileSettings.quitProject: Are you sure you want to quit this project?
profileSettings.quitOrganisation: Are you sure you want to quit this organisation?
profileSettings.noOrganisations: You are not a member of any organisation yet.
profileSettings.noSharedProjects: Nobody is sharing a project with you yet.
profileSettings.2faSectionDesc: Add an extra layer of security to your account.
profileSettings.2faDesc: An authenticator app that supports time-based, one-time passwords (TOTP) such as andOTP or Google Authenticator can scan the QR code below to enable 2FA on your Swetrix account:
profileSettings.2faQRAlt:
Can't scan the QR code?
Use this secret key instead: {{key}}
profileSettings.enter2faToEnable: Enter your one-time code to enable 2FA
profileSettings.enter2faToDisable: Enter your one-time code or a recovery code
profileSettings.2faRecoveryNote: You can use this recovery code to disable 2FA. Write it down and store it in a safe, secure place.
profileSettings.2faRecoveryWarning: Store your recovery code in a safe location. If you lose access to your authentication methods, it's the only way to recover your account. If you lose it, you will lose access to your account forever.
profileSettings.2faRecoverySaved: I have saved this recovery code
profileSettings.2faEnabled: Two-factor authenticated is enabled on your account.
profileSettings.2faEnabledSuccess: Two-factor authentication is active and protecting your account.
profileSettings.2faDisableHint: To disable two-factor authentication, please enter your 6-digit code or one of your recovery codes below.
profileSettings.2faSecurityRecommendation: Two-Factor Authentication adds an additional layer of security to your account by requiring more than just a password to sign in. We recommend you enable it.
profileSettings.noApiKey: You haven't created any API keys yet.
profileSettings.apiKeyWarning: Treat your API Key like a password and keep it secret. Never hardcode it into your programs, or share it with anyone.
profileSettings.apiKeyDeleteConf:
Are you sure you want to delete your API key?
All API access via this key will be disabled.
profileSettings.integrationsDesc: Integrations can be used to connect your favourite messengers to Swetrix and receive updates such as notifications, reports or alerts directly.

integrationsList.telegram: Receive notifications directly into a Telegram bot.
integrationsList.slack: Receive notifications in any Slack channel via webhook.
integrationsList.discord: Receive notifications in any Discord channel via webhook.
integrationsList.tgHint: Write a message to <url>{{username}}</url> to get your chat ID. This bot will be used later to send you notifications or alerts.
integrationsList.slackHint: We use Slack incoming webhooks to send notifications into your Slack communication channels. Please create a Slack app and <url>an incoming webhook</url> and paste it into the input field below.
integrationsList.discordHint: We use Discord webhooks to send you notifications. Please <url>create a Discord webhook</url> and paste it into the input field below.

profileSettings.socialisationsDesc: Socialisation feature allows you to link 3rd party accounts (like Google or Twitter) to your Swetrix account and use them to sign in to Swetrix.
profileSettings.cantUnlinkSocialisation: You can't unlink this socialisation because it was used to register your account.
profileSettings.selectTimeFormat: This will be the time notation used on the chart, it is only used to visualise the data on the chart in 12 hour or 24 hour format.
profileSettings.regenerateSecretKeyMessage:
Are you sure you want to regenerate your secret key?
All the existing CAPTCHA widgets will stop working and you will need to update them with the new secret key.
profileSettings.captchaSecretKeyHint: This is your secret key, it is used to verify the CAPTCHA response on your server. Keep it secret and do not share it with anyone.
profileSettings.showVisitorsInTitle: Show live visitors in the page title

passwordChangeWarningModal.title: You're about to change your password
passwordChangeWarningModal.body: You're about to change your password, this will log you out from all devices (including this one) and you will need to log in again with your new password.

organisations.createOrganisation: You haven't created or joined any organisations yet. Get started by creating your first organisation.

tabs.generalDesc: Update organisation name and basic details.
tabs.projectsDesc: Add or remove projects for this organisation.

invite.title: Invite a user to {{organisation}}
invite.desc: Enter an email address and a role of the person registered on Swetrix that you want to invite to the organisation. The invitation will expire in {{expiresIn}} hours.

owner.name: Owner
owner.desc: Can manage the organisation and its members, as well as manage the projects within the organisation.

admin.name: Admin
admin.desc: Can manage the organisation and its members, as well as manage the projects within the organisation.

viewer.name: Viewer
viewer.desc: Can only access the organisation and its projects without the ability to change any settings.

organisations.noProjectsFound: No projects found within this organisation

remove.title: Remove {{project}}?
remove.message: Are you sure you want to remove this project from the organisation? Once removed, organisation members will no longer have access to this project unless they are added in the project settings.

addProject.title: Add project to {{organisation}}
addProject.message: Select the project you want to add to the organisation. It will be available to all members of the organisation, and the organisation admins will be able to manage the project settings.

delete.title: Delete {{organisation}}?
delete.message:
Are you sure you want to delete this organisation?
All the data related to the organisation will be deleted from our servers. This action is irreversible.

dashboard.noProjectsForCriteria: No projects found for the selected criteria
dashboard.verifyEmailTitle: Please, verify the email address first
dashboard.verifyEmailDesc:
To start using our service and creating your projects, you first need to confirm your email address.

A link to confirm your account was sent to the email address you provided during registration, if it was not delivered - you can request the link again in your account settings.
dashboard.lowEventsTitle: You are running out of events!
dashboard.lowEventsDesc:
You have used more than 85% of the available events per your tier for this month.
That means that in case you use 100% of the available events until the end of the month, access to your reporting dashboard will be restricted.
To avoid this we recommend that you update your tier on the Billing page.
dashboard.accountLocked: Your account has been temporarily suspended due to a billing issue.
dashboard.eventsXPercUsed: You have used more than {{amount}}% of the available events per your tier for this month.
dashboard.createProject: You haven't created any projects yet. Get started by creating your first project.
dashboard.invitationDesc:
You have been invited to join the project {{project}}.
You can either accept the invitation here or reject it in your account settings.
dashboard.alertsDesc:
Automated alerts is a powerful tool that notifies you when some events occur on your website.
We can automatically monitor your project for traffic spikes and notify you via Telegram, Slack or Discord.
dashboard.goalsDesc:
Conversion goals help you track important user actions on your website.
Define pageview goals or custom event goals to measure how many visitors complete specific actions.
dashboard.featureFlagsDesc:
Feature flags allow you to toggle features for cohorts or individuals.
Test the impact before rolling out to everyone.
dashboard.revenueHint: Track sales, refunds and revenue from your payment providers.
dashboard.funnelsDesc:
Funnels is a powerful tool that allows you to track the conversion rate of your users through a series of steps.
The analysis provided by the marketing funnel gives you the ability to discover potential problems, improve your website, and boost your conversion rate.

alert.newErrorsOnlyHint: If enabled, an alert will be triggered only for the first occurrence of a specific error.
alert.alertOnEveryCustomEventHint: If enabled, an alert will be triggered every time the specified custom event occurs.
alert.noNameError: Please enter a name for the alert.
alert.queryValueError: Please fill threshold and the query value has to be a number.
alert.noIntegration: You have not configured an integration yet. Create one in your <url>account settings</url>.
alert.noNotificationChannel: You do not have a notification channel set up, please set it up to be notified when one of your alerts is triggered.
alert.deleteHint:
This action is irreversible.
The alert and all the data related to it will be deleted from our servers.
alert.name: Alert name
alert.enabledHint: Disabled alerts will not notify you of any events.

goals.title: Goals
goals.description:
Conversion goals help you track important user actions on your website.
Define pageview goals or custom event goals to measure how many visitors complete specific actions.
goals.deleteConfirmMessage: This action is irreversible. The goal and all its data will be permanently deleted.
goals.name: Goal name
goals.typePageviewDesc: Track visits to specific pages or sections of your website.
goals.typeCustomEventDesc: Track specific custom events triggered on your website.
goals.noMetadataFilters: No metadata filters added. Click 'Add filter' to filter by event metadata.
goals.noChartData: No chart data available for the selected period

featureFlags.title: Feature Flags
featureFlags.description:
Feature flags allow you to toggle features for cohorts or individuals.
Test the impact of new features before rolling out to everyone.
featureFlags.deleteConfirmMessage: This action is irreversible. The feature flag and all its data will be permanently deleted.
featureFlags.descriptionPlaceholder: What does this feature flag control?
featureFlags.noTargetingRules: No targeting rules. Flag will be served to all visitors.
featureFlags.enableFlagHint: When disabled, the flag will always return false.
featureFlags.implementationDescription: Use the code snippets below to check feature flags in your application.
featureFlags.noProfiles: No profiles have evaluated this flag yet

experiments.title: Experiments
experiments.description:
Run A/B tests to compare variants and find what works best.
Create experiments linked to goals and let Bayesian statistics determine the winner.
experiments.editDisabledRunning: Pause this experiment to edit settings.
experiments.deleteConfirmMessage: This action is irreversible. The experiment and all its data will be permanently deleted.
experiments.completeConfirmMessage: This will end the experiment and stop collecting data. You can still view the results.
experiments.name: Experiment name
experiments.noGoalsHint: Create a goal first to track conversions
experiments.variantFieldsRequired: Variant name and key are required
experiments.winnerDescription: {{variant}} has a 95%+ probability of being the best variant.
experiments.noDataDescription: Start your experiment to begin collecting data. Results will appear here once users are exposed to your variants.
experiments.statisticalNote: Results are calculated using Bayesian statistics. A variant is declared a winner when it has a 95% or higher probability of being the best. Collect more data for more reliable results.

exposureTrigger.defaultDesc: When a $feature_flag_called event is recorded, a user is considered exposed to the experiment.
exposureTrigger.customDesc: Select a custom event to signal that users reached the part of your app where the experiment runs.

multipleVariantOptions.excludeDesc: Users exposed to multiple variants will be excluded from the analysis (recommended).
multipleVariantOptions.firstExposureDesc: Only count the first variant a user was exposed to.

featureFlagMode.createDesc: Generate a new feature flag with custom variants for this experiment.
featureFlagMode.linkDesc: Use an existing multivariate feature flag and inherit its variants.

experiments.featureFlagKeyHint: Each experiment is backed by a feature flag. This key will be used to control the experiment in your code.

notFoundPage.title: Page not found
notFoundPage.description:
Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for.
Please check the URL in the address bar and try again.

project.passwordProtectedHint: Please enter the password to view this dashboard.
project.annotationsViewOnly: Only project managers can add annotations
project.aiDetailsDesc: The buttons above allow you to see an estimate of what kind of traffic you can expect within an hour in the next X hours.

metricType.title: Custom metric type
metricType.description: Specifies how to interpret the custom metric value. For example, Decimal will convert "15.99" to 15.99, while Integer will interpret it as 15.

optinalEventKey.title: Event key (optional)
optinalEventKey.description: Custom event metadata key to filter (for example, "currency").

optinalEventValue.title: Event value (optional)
optinalEventValue.description: Custom event metadata value to filter (for example, "GBP").

metrics.filterK: For "{{customEventName}}" aggregate "{{metricKey}}" where any key is "{{metaKey}}"
metrics.filterV: For "{{customEventName}}" aggregate "{{metricKey}}" where any value is "{{metaValue}}"

project.noExist: The selected project does not exist
project.noErrorDesc: This error does not exist or has not occurred within the specified time frame.
project.noSessionDesc: We could not find a session with the specified session ID.
project.noSessions: No sessions found for this user.
project.changeInSettings: Change this in your account settings

locked.title: Dashboard locked
locked.descExceedingTier:
This dashboard is locked because your traffic has exceeded your subscription plan.
In order to continue using Swetrix and have access to your stats, you need to upgrade your subscription plan to reflect your usage.
locked.descTialEnded:
This dashboard is locked because your trial ended.
In order to continue using Swetrix and have access to your stats, you need to subscribe to one of our tiers.
locked.descPaymentFailed:
This dashboard is locked because there was a problem with your last Swetrix subscription payment.
In order to continue using Swetrix and have access to your stats, you need to update / confirm your payment details.
locked.descSharedProject:
This dashboard is locked due to a billing issue of the project owner.
In order to continue using Swetrix and have access to the stats, the billing issue must be resolved first.
locked.descGenericIssue: This dashboard has been locked and is currently unavailable, please come back later or contact the project owner to resolve the issue.
locked.descSubCancelled:
This dashboard has been locked because you've cancelled your subscription.
In order to continue using Swetrix and have access to your stats, you need to have an active subscription.
locked.resolve: We're still counting your stats and we haven't deleted any of your data. Once you have updated your payment information, your dashboard access will be restored immediately.

waiting.title: No events yet
waiting.desc:
You haven't tracked any events yet.
<snippet>Click here</snippet> to view your JavaScript tracking code.

Still not working? Try <turl>troubleshooting</turl> your integration or <curl>contact us</curl> for help with your setup.

waitingCaptcha.title: No CAPTCHA events yet
waitingCaptcha.desc:
You haven't tracked any CAPTCHA events yet.
See our <guideurl>integration guide</guideurl> to learn more about how to use it in your application.

Still not working? Try <turl>troubleshooting</turl> your integration or <curl>contact us</curl> for help with your setup.

waitingError.title: No errors yet
waitingError.desc:
You haven't tracked any errors yet.
<howto>Click here</howto> to learn how to set up error tracking for your website.

Still not working? Try <turl>troubleshooting</turl> your integration or <curl>contact us</curl> for help with your setup.

project.noEvContent: No events have been recorded for the specified period, please try a different period.
project.noEventsFiltersDesc: No events have been recorded for the specified period or applied filters, please try a different period or change the filters applied.
project.noProfilesContent: No profiles have been recorded for the specified period, please try a different period.
project.noProfilesFiltersDesc: No profiles have been recorded for the specified period or applied filters, please try a different period or change the filters applied.
project.noSessionsContent: No sessions have been recorded for the specified period, please try a different period.
project.noSessionsFiltersDesc: No sessions have been recorded for the specified period or applied filters, please try a different period or change the filters applied.
project.noCaptchaEv:
No events have been captured for the specified timeframe.
If you haven't set up CAPTCHA yet, you can check out our <url>Docs</url> to easily integrate it into your app.
project.connectGsc: Connect Google Search Console to see keywords for this project.
project.gscConnectionRequired: Google Search Console connection is required to view keywords for this project. Ask the project administrator to connect it first.
project.noKeywordsFound: No keywords found for the selected period.
project.noParamData: No data for this parameter yet
project.selectKey: Select a key from the dropdown
project.conflictMetric: The metric you selected conflicts with an already selected one
project.codeExample: Or insert the following code into your website to track your events:
project.noEventsForSelectedPeriod: There are no events for the selected time period.

settings.resetShort: Clear analytics data. Keep project settings.
settings.deleteShort: Permanently delete the project and all data.

gsc.connect: Connect your project to your Google Search Console account to get stats like what keywords people are using to find your website.
gsc.disconnected: The project has been disconnected from your Google Search Console account.
gsc.connectDisclamer: For the integration to work, make sure you have set up your website on the <url>Google Search Console</url> first.
gsc.propertyConnected: Selected property saved to your project
gsc.websitePropertyHint: Select the Google Search Console property you want to see the keywords for. If you don't see your domain here, make sure you have added and verified it on the Google Search Console.

tabs.generalDesc: Configure your project name and basic settings.
tabs.accessDesc: Control who can view and access your project.
tabs.shieldsDesc: Protect your analytics from bots and unwanted traffic.
tabs.captchaDesc: Add human verification to protect your forms.
tabs.emailsDesc: Configure email reports and notification preferences.
tabs.peopleDesc: Manage team members and their permissions.
tabs.annotationsDesc: Add notes to mark important events on your charts.
tabs.dangerDesc: Destructive actions that cannot be undone.
tabs.integrationsDesc: Connect external services to enrich your analytics.
tabs.revenueDesc: Track revenue and attribute sales to campaigns.

revenue.title: Revenue Tracking
revenue.description: Connect your payment provider to track revenue and attribute sales to marketing channels.
revenue.connectPaddleDesc: Enter your Paddle API key to start tracking revenue. We will automatically sync transactions from your Paddle account.
revenue.paddleDocsLink: Learn how to get your Paddle API key
revenue.apiKeyHint: Your Paddle API key for read-only access to transactions.
revenue.createApiKeyHint: Create a restricted API key from your
revenue.currencyDescription: Used for all revenue reporting and payment conversion.
revenue.currencyHint: All revenue will be converted and displayed in this currency.
revenue.learnMore: Learn how to link revenue with traffic sources

attribution.title: Revenue Attribution
attribution.description: Pass visitor and session IDs to your payment provider to attribute revenue to marketing channels.

captcha.title: CAPTCHA Integration
captcha.description: Enable CAPTCHA protection for your forms and actions. Generate a secret key to integrate Swetrix CAPTCHA with your application.
captcha.regenerateKeyWarning: Are you sure you want to regenerate the secret key? This will invalidate the current key and all applications using it will need to be updated.
captcha.noKeyGenerated: No secret key has been generated yet. Generate one to enable CAPTCHA for this project.
captcha.learnMore: Use this secret key in your backend to verify CAPTCHA tokens. Learn more in our documentation.
captcha.difficultyHint: Higher difficulty levels provide better bot protection but may be more challenging for users to solve.

annotations.title: Annotations
annotations.description: Mark important events on your charts to remember why traffic patterns changed.
annotations.empty: No annotations yet. Add annotations to mark important events on your charts.
annotations.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this annotation? This action cannot be undone.

levels.off: Off: we allow all incoming traffic
levels.basic: Basic: we detect bots based on their user agent (Googlebot, Bingbot, curl, etc.)

settings.pxCharsError: Project name cannot be longer than {{amount}} characters.
settings.oxCharsError: A list of allowed origins has to be smaller than {{amount}} symbols.
settings.name: Project name
settings.sharableDesc: To share your dashboard with others, only available if you make your dashboard public or password protected.
settings.websiteUrlHint: Optional. Your website URL is used to display a favicon next to your project name and to make page paths clickable in analytics.
settings.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid URL (e.g., https://example.com)
settings.originsHint:
A list of origins (domains) which are allowed to use script with your ProjectID, separated by commas.
Leave it empty to allow all origins (default setting).
Example: cornell.edu, app.example.com, *.gov.ua
settings.enabledHint:
Disabled projects will not count any newly incoming events or pageviews.
You will still be able to access the project's analytics in dashboard.
settings.publicHint:
By checking this, anyone on the Internet (including Google) would be able to see this project's dashboard.
Only the project administrator can edit the settings.
settings.createHint: *you will be able to set up your project more thoroughly after you have created it
settings.deleteHint:
By pressing 'Delete project' you understand, that this action is irreversible.
The project and all the data related to it will be deleted from our servers.
settings.resetHint:
By pressing 'Reset project' you understand, that this action is irreversible.
The project's pageviews and custom events will be removed from our servers, but the project identifier and other configuration will be retained.
settings.noPeople: No people have been added to this project yet.
settings.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to stop sharing your project with this user?
settings.removeReportConfirm: Are you sure you want to stop sending project reports to this user?
settings.addARecipientDesc:
Enter an email address of the person you want to send reports to. They don't necessarily need to have an account on Swetrix.
We will send them your site's reports on a regular basis.
settings.inviteDesc:
Enter an email address and a role of the person you want to share your project with.
We shall contact them over email to offer the access to the project, and they will see the invitation in their dashboard as well.
settings.inviteDescSelfhosted:
Enter an email address and a role of the person you want to share your project with.
They will see the invitation in their dashboard.
settings.inviteExpity: The invitation will expire in {{amount}} hours.

admin.name: Administrator
admin.desc: Can manage the project's settings, add/remove members, and invite new users.

viewer.name: Viewer
viewer.desc: Has a read-only access to the project.

settings.ipBlacklistHint:
A list of IP addresses from which no analytics will be collected on this project.
This functionality is handy if you want to ignore analytics from your IP, for example.
Example: 172.126.10.16, 192.168.0.1/32, ::1
settings.countryBlacklistHint: Traffic from these countries will not be tracked. This is useful if you want to exclude specific regions from your analytics.
settings.transferHint:
You can transfer '{{name}}' project to another user.
This user will become the project's owner and will be able to manage the project's settings, add/remove members, and invite new users.
You will be assigned to the project as an administrator. However, the new owner will be able to remove you from the project.

reseted.allHint: All of the project's related analytics data will be permanently removed from our servers, but the project itself, it's settings and the ID will still be available.
reseted.partiallyDesc: The 'Reset partially' function allows you to reset the data of a specific project within a given date range.
reseted.partiallyHint:
To reset the data of a specific project within a date range, select the start and end dates of the range and the project you wish to reset.
Double-check that you have selected the correct project and date range before clicking 'Reset'.
Once you click 'Reset', all the data associated with the selected project within the selected date range will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
reseted.viaFiltersHint: The 'Reset via filters' function allows you to reset the data of a specific project within a given date range and with specific filters.
reseted.noFilters: No filters selected or no data for the selected filter type

settings.protectedHint: You can protect your project with a password. That way, people who know the password can access it through a shareable link.

settings.name: CAPTCHA project name
settings.enabledHint:
Disabled CAPTCHA projects will not count any newly incoming events.
You will still be able to access the analytics in dashboard.

emails.title: Email reports
emails.description: Send regular email reports to as many recipients as you want

userFlow.title: User flow
userFlow.noData: User flow is not available yet due to lack of data, or you disabled this feature in the tracking script parameters

project.compareDateRangeError: This date range cannot be compared, please select a other date range

revenue.title: Revenue Analytics
revenue.notConfiguredDesc: Connect your payment provider in project settings to start tracking revenue.
revenue.noTransactions: No transactions found for this period.

askAi.title: Ask AI
askAi.subtitle: Ask questions about your analytics data
askAi.welcomeTitle: How can I help you understand your users?
askAi.welcomeSubtitle: Get insights from your analytics data.
askAi.error: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.
askAi.disclaimer: AI responses may not always be accurate. Verify important data.
askAi.deleteChatConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this chat?

capabilities.title: Swetrix AI can:
capabilities.queryAnalytics: Query analytics including pageviews, visitors, and sessions
capabilities.performanceMetrics: Performance metrics like page load times and TTFB
capabilities.errorTracking: Error tracking data and top errors
capabilities.trafficPatterns: Analyze traffic patterns (top pages, countries, browsers, referrers)
capabilities.cannotSeeOutside: See data outside this Swetrix project

suggestions.compareVisitors: Compare visitors this week vs last week
suggestions.topTrafficSources: What are my top traffic sources?
suggestions.mobilePerformance: How does my site perform on mobile?
suggestions.deviceTypesChart: Create a pie chart of most common device types

billing.noActiveSubscription: You don't have an active subscription.
billing.noActiveSubscriptionDescription: Don't worry, we still collect your analytics data. But if you want to continue using Swetrix, please upgrade your account to one of our subscription tiers.
billing.subscriptionCancelledDescription: Your subscription is active until {{date}}. After that, you will not be able to access your analytics data. Don't worry, we will still store incoming events and pageviews for your projects in case you change your mind.
billing.usageOverview: This month you have tracked {{tracked}} events ({{trackedPerc}}%) of the {{maxEvents}} events in your plan.
billing.previewLoadingError:
An error occured while loading the pricing preview, please try again later.
If the problem persists, please contact us at <mail>{{email}}</mail>.
You can still change your plan, but you won't be able to see the pricing preview at the moment, sorry for that.
billing.dueNowDescription: You will be charged pro-rated amount for the remaining days of the current billing period.
billing.negativePayment: Negative 'Amount' means that you will have a credit balance of {{currency}}{{dueNowAmount}}. You will be billed {{currency}}0.00 on {{dueNowDate}}. Once the credit balance is used up, your recurring billing amount will be {{currency}}{{nextPaymentAmount}} every billing cycle of your subscription plan.
billing.planUsageDesc: The plan usage shows the number of events (page views, custom events, error events) that you have used for the current month.
billing.resetDate: The plan usage resets on the first day of each month ({{days}} days until reset)
billing.selectPlan: Select a subscription plan to unveil full Swetrix potential.
billing.changePlan: You can change or cancel your subscription plan at any time here.
billing.membersNotification: Pageviews, custom events and error events are counted towards the limit of the subscription of the account owner. People you invite into your projects don't need a subscription.
billing.trialDescription: Your free trial includes access to all features and unlimited data collection limits. When your trial ends, you'll need to select a paid plan that matches your usage to continue using Swetrix.
billing.usageWarningHigh: You've used {{percentage}}% of your monthly event limit. Consider upgrading your plan to avoid service interruption.
billing.usageWarningCritical: Warning: You've used {{percentage}}% of your monthly event limit! Upgrade now to ensure uninterrupted service.

paidFeature.title: Upgrade your plan to use this feature
paidFeature.desc:
We apologise for the inconvenience, but you must subscribe to a paid plan to use this feature.

We realise that you might not be ready to buy a paid subscription yet, but buying it will give you not only access to this feature, but also many other great perks, such as access to all the other paid features, higher limits on visits per month and number of websites available, and you will support the growth of a small business :)

trackingSnippet.title: Add a Swetrix tracking code to your website
trackingSnippet.add: Add the following snippet into the <bsect></bsect> section of your site.
trackingSnippet.docs: Check our <pdocs>our documentation</pdocs> for details and more integration guides.

annotation.warning: Caution: Don't include sensitive information. All users with access to this property can see annotation content.

pricing.title: Simple, traffic-based pricing
pricing.adv:
Try Swetrix on your website for {{amount}} days - completely free of charge.
No credit card required. No strings attached.
pricing.legacyDescription: This plan or pricing is no longer available for new users. It is still available for existing users.

tiers.moreWebsitesForFee: Swetrix has no limit on the number of websites you can add. {{amount}} websites are the default limit all plans have. You can purchase more websites for an additional fee.

pricing.downgradeTitle: Are you sure you want to downgrade?
pricing.downgradeDesc:
After downgrading, your plan will include fewer projects and available events per month. In case your website contains more traffic than the plan you want to downgrade to includes, this will result in not all events being stored in our database.
You will be able to return to your current plan at any time.
If you have any questions, you can always email us at {{email}}.
pricing.cancelTitle: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?
pricing.cancelDesc:
After cancelling your subscription, no new events will be collected by Swetrix for your projects.
You will be able to return to your current plan at any time.
If you have any questions, you can always email us at {{email}}.

contact.description: You can reach us at <mail>{{email}}</mail>, tweet us at <twitter>{{twitterHandle}}</twitter> or talk to us via our <discord>Discord</discord> community. We aim to respond as soon as possible, usually within a day.

docs.title: Documentation
docs.desc: Learn how to integrate Swetrix into your application and find answers to the most common questions

demo.title: Book a demo call
demo.desc: Book a demo with our team to see how Swetrix can solve your problems

open.desc: Swetrix is an Open Startup, we share our metrics, such as revenue, losses, amount of users, etc. with the public.

finance.title: Finance metrics
finance.desc: Our financial metrics, such as revenue, losses, etc.

usage.title: Usage metrics
usage.desc: Our user metrics, such as amount of active users, connected websites.
usage.live: You can see our live metrics on our <livedemo>public dashboard</livedemo>. You can also make your own Swetrix Dashboards public and adjust them to your needs.

welcomeScreen.title: Welcome to Swetrix!
welcomeScreen.subtitle: Privacy-first, cookieless analytics that give you the insights you need without compromising your users' privacy.
welcomeScreen.featureDesc: A place to understand your traffic, track errors, and make data-driven decisions.

traffic.title: Traffic Analytics
traffic.desc: Understand your website traffic with real-time analytics. See where your visitors come from, what pages they view, and how they interact with your site.
traffic.tip: Track visitors worldwide with no cookies required.

errors.title: Error Tracking
errors.desc: Catch and fix bugs before your users notice them. Get detailed error reports with stack traces, browser info, and user context.
errors.tip: Receive instant alerts when new errors occur.

sessions.title: User Sessions
sessions.desc: See exactly how users navigate through your site. Understand user journeys, identify drop-off points, and optimise the experience.
sessions.tip: View real-time sessions as they happen.

confirm.navDesc: Check your inbox and click the confirmation link.
confirm.title: One step left and you're ready to go! 🚀
confirm.linkSent: We sent an email to <email>{{email}}</email>. Please confirm your email address to continue.
confirm.troubleOrChange: Do you have trouble or want to change your email address?
confirm.spam: Can't see the email? Please check your spam folder.

createProject.navDesc: Add a website to start tracking analytics.
createProject.title: Let's set up your first project
createProject.desc: Create a project to start tracking your website's analytics. Enter a name for it to continue.

installTracking.navDesc: Add the Swetrix script to your website.
installTracking.title: Set up Swetrix on your website
installTracking.desc: Add the Swetrix script to your website. You can also use Swetrix for tracking events on your mobile or desktop apps, send events directly to our API. Learn more about more advanced integrations in our <url>documentation</url>.
installTracking.pasteScript: Paste the script to your website
installTracking.weAlsoSupport: We also support intalling Swetrix via NPM (for React, Vue, etc.), provide Events API to send events directly to our API, and many different integrations with other services like WordPress or Google Tag Manager. <url>Learn more</url>.

verifyInstallation.navDesc: We're waiting for your first event to arrive.
verifyInstallation.desc: Deploy your changes, and try visiting your website to send the first event.
verifyInstallation.needInstructionsAgain: Need to see the instructions again? <btn>Click here</btn>
verifyInstallation.orContactUs: Or <url>contact us</url> for further help with your setup.
verifyInstallation.waitingForAnEvent: We're waiting for your first event! If your integration is set up correctly, you should see it within 1 minute.
verifyInstallation.eventReceived: We've received your first event! Your integration works correctly. Welcome to Swetrix!

titles.performance: End user performance monitoring to deliver fast websites
titles.errors: End user error tracking tool to deliver bug-free experiences

description.default: Swetrix is a privacy-first, cookieless Google Analytics alternative with real-time analytics, no sampling, and built-in performance & error monitoring.
description.blog: Stay updated with the latest insights, product updates, case studies, and use cases from Swetrix.
description.captcha: Swetrix Captcha is a privacy-first alternative to traditional CAPTCHAs. Protect your website from bots and spam without annoying your users with puzzles.
description.contact: Contact Swetrix (cookieless & privacy-first Google Analytics alternative) for support, feedback, or any questions and suggestions.
description.errorTracking: Privacy-first end-user error tracking by Swetrix. Set up in one line, see errors by browser/device/location, and fix issues faster. 14-day free trial - no card required.
description.login: Log in to Swetrix to view your cookieless, privacy-friendly analytics - real-time insights, no tracking cookies, no GA clutter.
description.signup: Create your Swetrix account and start tracking website traffic with cookieless, privacy-friendly analytics - simple setup, real-time stats.
description.onboarding: Get started with Swetrix (cookieless & privacy-first Google Analytics alternative) in just a few steps.
description.open: Open startup metrics: learn more about our key financial & operational metrics.
description.recovery: Forgot your password? Use our password recovery functionality to restore access to your account.
description.performance: Monitor real-user website speed with Swetrix - page load, TTFB, DNS/TLS timings and percentiles. Privacy-first and cookieless. Free 14-day trial, no card required.
description.project: View public web analytics for {{name}}. Privacy-friendly tracking powered by Swetrix - no cookies or invasive user tracking.
description.projectWithPassword: This analytics project is password-protected. Enter the password to view privacy-friendly web analytics powered by Swetrix — no cookies or invasive user tracking.

trialBanner.youHaveXDaysLeft: You have {{amount}} days left on your free trial

exitIntentPopup.title: Web Analytics without cookies
exitIntentPopup.desc: Swetrix helps you to understand your audience and monitor your traffic without compromising your users' privacy.

footer.description: Independent web analytics that respects user privacy
footer.ceDescription: This is a community edition of Swetrix, running on self-managed infrastructure. We cannot guarantee its performance or reliability. For official managed hosting, check out <url>swetrix.com</url>.
